name: Fishing Rush: Cerrado
description:
This is a casual fishing game that takes place in the countryside of Brazil.

Hook some fish during the day, and sell your profit at night. buy better equipment and just fish all the collectible unique species of Brasilain's Cerrado.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Use WASD or the ARROWS to move your character.
- Use the mouse click to throw the bait at the river. After the "!" appears, click again and don't let the tension bar touch the bottom.
- After your fishing time is over, get back to your house to sell your profit, buy new gear, and sleep for the next fishing day.

The game saves your progress automatically, feel free to play on your own time! =)
